idea-plugin.name: Canopy
idea-plugin.description:
Canopy - JIRA to Azure DevOps Bridge

A comprehensive plugin that streamlines the development workflow between JIRA issue tracking and Azure DevOps version control.

Features:

  • List JIRA Tickets: View all tickets assigned to you with real-time status updates
  • Create Git Branches: Automatically create properly named branches from ticket IDs
  • Create Pull Requests: Generate Azure DevOps pull requests with rich ticket information
  • Persistent Configuration: Securely store API keys and settings
  • Integrated Workflow: Seamlessly switch between tickets, branches, and pull requests

Requirements:

  • JIRA Cloud/Server access with API tokens
  • Azure DevOps access with Personal Access Tokens
  • Git repository in your project

Perfect for development teams using JIRA for issue tracking and Azure DevOps for code management.

action.description: Open the Canopy tool window to manage JIRA tickets and Azure DevOps integration
